name: Sonic Foundry Video Capture File
summary: Learn about .SFVIDCAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Sonic Foundry's media creation software programs were bought by Sony in 2003. Then, in 2016, Vegas software was acquired by MAGIX.

description: Project file containing video clips captured with or imported into Sonic Foundry Vegas; created by saving "advanced capture data" within the Vegas video-editing program.
